attributes.action: Tell the government that we voted and said no to the EU
attributes.additional_details:
The guardian and other europhile liberal lefties say the government should ignore the result

There is to be a debate in Westminster based on their petition

Sign and make sure we are not ignored
attributes.background:
We had a vote on membership and we said no.

We were not stupid, ignorant, uneducated, racist or any of the 'phobics that we have been described.

The petition for another referendum has enough votes for debate and already the liberals have vowed to ignore our decision.
